accountCreationLimitErr.description: Error message for reaching a limit in account creation for specific network.
accountCreationLimitErr.message: Looks like you have reached the account creation limit, please ensure you have at least one active account in the wallet app and try again.

dAppManagementPromptMessage.description: DApp Management disconnect session prompt message
dAppManagementPromptMessage.message: Are you sure you want to disconnect $accountId$ from $dAppName$?

openFromLinkWaiting.description: Message for waiting for extension to open the app
openFromLinkWaiting.message: Extension will open shortly. In case of an error recheck if the URl is valid.

tokenSearchPlaceholder.message: Token ID, collection name, or symbol
